1.t: (Muhammad), read in the name of your Lord who created (all things).

2.t: He created man from a clot of blood.

3.t: Recite! Your Lord is the most Honorable One,

4.t: who, by the pen, taught the human being:

5.t: He taught the human being what he did not know.

6.t: Despite this, the human being still tends to rebel

7.t: because he thinks that he is independent.

8.t: However, (all things) will return to your Lord.

9.t: Have you seen the one who prohibits

10.t: a servant of Ours from prayer?

11.t: What will happen if the praying person is rightly guided

12.t: or if he commands others to maintain piety!?

13.t: What will happen if the prohibiting rejects the Truth and turns away from it!?

14.t: Does he not realize that God sees him?

15.t: Let him know that if he does not desist, We shall certainly drag him by his forelocks,
15.tr: Kalla la-il lam yantahi la-nasfa'am bin-nasiyah

17.t: Let him call on his associates for help

18.t: and We too will call the stern and angry keepers of hell.

19.t: (Muhammad), never yield to him! Prostrate yourself and try to come closer to God.
